dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5986 IH: To prohibit funds for the Palestinian-controlled West Bank or Gaza.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mast introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit funds for the Palestinian-controlled West Bank or Gaza.

section.header: Prohibition on funds for the Palestinian-controlled West Bank or Gaza
section.text: No Federal funds may be obligated or expended to provide funding or any other assistance for the Palestinian-controlled West Bank or Gaza.
